'''Orange dye''' is one of the sixteen available [[dye]]s.

== Obtaining ==

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
  |head = 1
  |showname = 0
  |Orange Tulip; Torchflower; Open Eyeblossom
  |Output=Orange Dye
  |type=Material
}}
{{Crafting
  |Red Dye
  |Yellow Dye
  |Output = Orange Dye,2
  |type = Material
  |foot = 1
}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|orange-dye}}

=== Trading ===
[[Wandering trader]]s may sell 3 orange dye for an [[emerald]].
